snippet: Mitt Romney drew the wrong lesson from a callous and mean-spirited Florida campaign.
abstract: Editorial contends that Mitt Romney's Republican presidential campaign has taken on an ever-darker tone since the Florida primary, where he and Newt Gingrich assaulted each other with brutal and often dishonest political attacks; asserts Romney's callous rhetoric may appeal to hard-line conservatives but it is alienating independents.
lead_paragraph: Mitt Romney drew the wrong lesson from a callous and mean-spirited Florida campaign.

headline.seo: The Darkening Tone of the Primaries
headline.main: The Darkening Tone of the Primaries
headline.print_headline: The Darkening Tone of the Primaries
